Class FilePropertiesWorker

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.SwingWorker<Void,Void>
vista.FilePropertiesWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Future<Void>, RunnableFuture<Void>
public class FilePropertiesWorker extends SwingWorker<Void,Void>
Class that performs background calculations to obtain the properties of a file or directory.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Roymar Castillo, Deiner Cespedes, Yader Siezar

  • Constructor Details

    • FilePropertiesWorker

      public FilePropertiesWorker(File file, JLabel sizeLabel, JLabel fileCountLabel, JLabel dirCountLabel)
      Constructor for FilePropertiesWorker.
      Parameters:
      file - the file or directory for which properties will be obtained
      sizeLabel - the label where the size of the file or directory will be displayed
      fileCountLabel - the label where the number of files in the directory will be displayed
      dirCountLabel - the label where the number of directories in the directory will be displayed

      Calculates the size of the specified file or directory.
      Parameters:
      file - the file or directory to calculate the size of
      Returns:
      the size of the file or directory

    • calculateFileAndDirCount

      private int[] calculateFileAndDirCount(File file)
      Calculates the number of files and directories in the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      file - the directory to calculate the counts for
      Returns:
      an array where the first element is the file count and the second element is the directory count

    • formatSize

      private String formatSize(long size)
      Formats the size in bytes to a human-readable string with appropriate units.
      Parameters:
      size - the size in bytes
      Returns:
      the formatted size string
